item.title: Lecture notes: "Statistical properties of dynamics. Introduction to the functional analytic approach"
item.description:
I’m uploading the lecture notes of a minicourse, in the Pisa-Hokkaido summer school 2015.

It is a very elementary approach to the subject, intended for advanced undergaduate students or first years Ph.D. ones. Notes_2015_hokudai2

item.title: Lecture notes on "Complessità Caos Informazione"
item.description:

Complessità Caos Informazione
